name: Kerr
data: \frac{a^2 r \sin (2 \theta ) r_s \left(r r_s-h\right)}{\Sigma  \left(2 h \Sigma -r r_s \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)\right)}
\frac{a^2 r \sin (2 \theta ) r_s \left(r r_s-h\right)}{\Sigma  \left(2 h \Sigma -r r_s \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)\right)}
\frac{2 a^3 r \sin ^3(\theta ) \cos (\theta ) r_s \left(h-r r_s\right)}{c \Sigma  \left(2 h \Sigma -r r_s \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)\right)}
\frac{2 a^3 r \sin ^3(\theta ) \cos (\theta ) r_s \left(h-r r_s\right)}{c \Sigma  \left(2 h \Sigma -r r_s \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)\right)}
-\frac{2 a c r r_s \left(a^2 \sin (\theta ) \cos (\theta )+\Sigma  \cot (\theta )-r \cot (\theta ) r_s\right)}{\Sigma  \left(2 h \Sigma -r r_s \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)\right)}
\frac{r_s \left(a^2 \sin ^2(\theta ) \left(\Sigma -2 r^2\right)-2 r^2 \Sigma \right)+2 r \Sigma ^2}{\Sigma  \left(2 h \Sigma -r r_s \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)\right)}
-\frac{2 a c r r_s \left(a^2 \sin (\theta ) \cos (\theta )+\Sigma  \cot (\theta )-r \cot (\theta ) r_s\right)}{\Sigma  \left(2 h \Sigma -r r_s \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)\right)}

\frac{2 h \Sigma ^2 \cot (\theta )-r \csc ^2(\theta ) r_s \left(-2 a^4 \sin ^5(\theta ) \cos (\theta )+\Sigma  \sin (2 \theta ) \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+r^2\right)+2 a^2 r \sin ^3(\theta ) \cos (\theta ) r_s\right)}{\Sigma  \left(2 h \Sigma -r r_s \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)\right)}
\frac{r_s \left(a^2 \sin ^2(\theta ) \left(\Sigma -2 r^2\right)-2 r^2 \Sigma \right)+2 r \Sigma ^2}{\Sigma  \left(2 h \Sigma -r r_s \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)\right)}

\frac{2 h \Sigma ^2 \cot (\theta )-r \csc ^2(\theta ) r_s \left(-2 a^4 \sin ^5(\theta ) \cos (\theta )+\Sigma  \sin (2 \theta ) \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+r^2\right)+2 a^2 r \sin ^3(\theta ) \cos (\theta ) r_s\right)}{\Sigma  \left(2 h \Sigma -r r_s \left(a^2 \cos (2 \theta )+a^2+2 r^2\right)\right)}
